long_description: CamelBak Fresh reservoir filter supplies fresh-filtered water straight out of your compatible CamelBak reservoir. Clicks into any CamelBak reservoir that has the Quick Link(TM) system for on-the-fly taste filtration. Filter does not impact flow rate, so you can enjoy filtered water as fast as you need. One filter lasts up to 120 liters of use. Will work with CamelBak OMEGA reservoirs with the purchase of a Quick Link conversion kit (sold separately).
short_description: CamelBak Fresh reservoir filter supplies fresh-filtered water straight out of your compatible CamelBak reservoir.
